name: Scabbard of Stanching
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Scabbard of Stanching

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, cure light wounds

sections.body: This fine, red leather sheath is decorated with gold filigree. It fits any bladed slashing weapon. While worn, a scabbard of stanching protects against bleed damage. Anytime the wearer suffers a bleed effect, the scabbard automatically stanches it. It has no effect on bleed damage from effects that require a DC 16 or higher caster level or Heal check.
